Control Name: 2.3 Ensure that retention policies on log buckets are configured using Bucket Lock
Control Statement: It is recommended to create a sink that will export copies of all the log entries. This can help aggregate logs from multiple projects and export them to a Security Information and Event Management (SIEM).
